mapper.select: select c.id,c.createUser,c.createTime,c.updateUser,c.updateTime, f.farmCode,f.farmName,fz.farmZoneCode,fz.farmZoneName, c.cattleCode,c.cattleName,c.breed,sb.value breedValue, c.sex,c.color,c.birthday,c.remark from t_cattle c left join t_farm_zone fz on c.farmZoneCode=fz.farmZoneCode left join t_farm f on fz.farmCode=f.farmCode left join t_sys_config sb on sb.code='cattleBreed' and c.breed=sb.key where c.cattleCode=#{cattleCode}
